title: United States : retail e-commerce sales 2017 to 2024
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2022, and lastly roughly constant from 2022 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 599186.0 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 315629.0 was reached at Year 2018
